titles.title: SEEED Commission Act of 2012
Social Enterprise Ecosystem and Economic Development Commission Act of 2012
To provide for the establishment of a Commission on the Advancement of Social Enterprise.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 9/21/2012--Introduced. Social Enterprise Ecosystem and Economic Development Commission Act of 2012 or the SEEED Commission Act of 2012 - Establishes the Commission on the Advancement of Social Enterprise to examine and make recommendations on ways the federal government can support and utilize social enterprises. Requires the Commission to: (1) establish criteria for identifying social enterprises for purposes of federal programs, and (2) identify opportunities for the federal government to engage social enterprises in creating jobs and strengthening local economies.
